long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This browser extension changes your existing new tab page to a a homepage with a built in game of Solitaire. It will feature: A built in responsive and dynamic game of classic Solitaire for you to play. Links to popular websites for when you are finished. Convenient web search powered by Bing.com search results. With it, you can easily search for your favourite topics, images, videos, and news
